title: Attributed Model Conversions
description: Attributed Model Conversions is the Raw Conversion Count and Sum of Conversions

xdm:searchEngineId.title: Search Engine Identifier
xdm:searchEngineId.description: The application-specified identifier used to identify the Search Advertising Platform Name

xdm:campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
xdm:campaignId.description: Campaign Identifer on the advertising platform

xdm:placementId.title: Placement Identifier
xdm:placementId.description: Placement ID on the dsp advertising platform

xdm:adgroupId.title: Ad Group Identifier
xdm:adgroupId.description: Ad Group ID on the search advertising platform

xdm:adId.title: Ad Identifier
xdm:adId.description: Ad ID on the advertising platform

xdm:term.title: Search Term
xdm:term.description: Search Term that contributed to the conversion

xdm:termId.title: Search Term Identifier
xdm:termId.description: Search Term ID on the search advertising platform

xdm:matchType.title: Term Match Type
xdm:matchType.description: Match Type associated to the Search Term being targeted for the Ad

xdm:propertyName.title: Property Name
xdm:propertyName.description: Property Name Configured by Pixel, Analytics, Custom Feeds

xdm:modelName.title: Model Name
xdm:modelName.description: Model that was executed to generate Raw Conversion Count and Sum for the attributed conversion

xdm:clickThroughCount.title: Click Through Conversion Count
xdm:clickThroughCount.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Count for models if trigger event is Click

xdm:clickThroughValue.title: Click Through Conversion Sum
xdm:clickThroughValue.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Sum for models if trigger event is Click

xdm:viewThroughCount.title: View Through Conversion Count
xdm:viewThroughCount.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Count for models if trigger event is Impression

xdm:viewThroughValue.title: View Through Conversion Sum
xdm:viewThroughValue.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Sum for models if trigger event is Impression

xdm:clickPlusViewThroughCount.title: Click View Through Conversion Count
xdm:clickPlusViewThroughCount.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Count for models if trigger event is click but impressions present in path

xdm:clickPlusViewThroughValue.title: Click View Through Conversion Sum
xdm:clickPlusViewThroughValue.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Sum for models if trigger event is click but impressions present in path

xdm:viewPlusClickThroughCount.title: View Click Through Conversion Count
xdm:viewPlusClickThroughCount.description: Raw Conversion Count for models if trigger event is impression but clicks present in path

xdm:viewPlusClickThroughValue.title: View Click Through Conversion Sum
xdm:viewPlusClickThroughValue.description: Raw Conversion Sum for models if trigger event is impression but clicks present in path

xdm:conversionType.title: Conversion Type
xdm:conversionType.description: Feed Conversion Type the conversion event originated from

xdm:device.title: Device
xdm:device.description: The device conversion event originated from
